Replace.Text: No problem~!
I think it's totally unnecessary...
Do you want to come to the beach with me and enjoy some fresh air?
Wow, he actually agreed. This might be a miracle~!
Oops..I'm sorry...
Do you really have the confidence to defeat me?
Hmm...it looks like we need to clear the waterway!
Come! This way please~!
Not now, my seafood barbecue is not ready yet!
I brought some barbecued seafood that I made myself, would you like to try it?
It seems to be different from what I thought...
You are not welcome here!
Ah~ The scenery at the seaside is so beautiful! Stranger, do you think so too?
This is the base I built on the beach. It looks great, right? Do you want to come over and have some fun?
Well, the seaside is still more beautiful...but your city is almost the same as Ain Sophie~!
Can we exchange places? If I have time, I will go to your city to buy some supplies.
I'm going sailing, do you want to come with me?
Hey, hey! You have too many visitors here, right? If I'm not mistaken, they are carrying weapons... You won't do anything rash, right?
Take your people away quickly, they are delaying my departure.
Hey, I was the first one to come to this beach!
You are such a difficult guy...
It's not that easy to steal from me.
Don't you think your behavior is shameful?
Your followers keep telling me this and that. I'm getting really annoyed. Can you get your followers to leave? I'm not interested in your beliefs at all...
No, you...
Sorry...I might need to take a break...
Very good! Happy cooperation!
This doesn't work...
The space is too small. I can't hold a beach barbecue party.
Skadi thinks your city is too close to her
Skadi
What do you do when you are not out at sea? Of course, you take care of the Snow Crystal II and the Wave Cutter! If you don’t take good care of your beloved things, they will get sick.
Cruise mode

After creating the capital, you will immediately get Skadi and Leviathan, and you will have Navigation and Celestial Navigation at the beginning. All units will not consume [ICON_Movement] movement when embarking or disembarking. Water cells +2 [ICON_Food] Food +2 [ICON_Production] Production +5 [ICON_Gold] Gold, {LOC_BUILDING_LIGHTHOUSE_NAME} +3 [ICON_Food] Food +3 [ICON_Production] Production +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold. In addition to the {LOC_BUILDING_LIGHTHOUSE_NAME} building, each building in the port area has +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade capacity. After each building in the port area is built, you can get a merchant, and the cost of purchasing port area buildings [ICON_Gold] is -100%
Wanting to see the end of the ocean was actually my father’s dream, but it was his belief that pushed me to embark on a journey to explore the ocean. - Skadi
Headwinds
She hates all the neighboring countries because they only prevent her from expanding her coastline.
Holy Tree Domain♬
Divine Domain: Holy Tree
